channel.title: CVE Feed for Palo Alto Networks -- Bridgecrew Checkov
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palo Alto Networks -- Bridgecrew Checkov

item.title: CVE-2021-3035|2024-09-17T03:17:34.411Z -- palo%20alto%20networks -- bridgecrew%20checkov
item.description: An unsafe deserialization vulnerability in Bridgecrew Checkov by Prisma Cloud allows arbitrary code execution when processing a malicious terraform file. This issue impacts Checkov 2.0 versions earlier than Checkov 2.0.26. Checkov 1.0 versions are not impacted.
